meanings.definition: Incorrect use or application of something.
meanings.sent1: The misapplication of the tool led to a broken part.
meanings.sent2: The misapplication of the rule caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: His misapplication of the recipe turned the dish into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The misapplication of trust can lead to broken relationships.
meanings.sent5: The misapplication of paint made the wall look messy.

meanings.definition: The act of using something in a wrong or inappropriate way.
meanings.sent1: She realized the misapplication of the term in her essay.
meanings.sent2: The misapplication of the technology resulted in system errors.
meanings.sent3: The misapplication of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His misapplication of the dance move made it look awkward.
meanings.sent5: The misapplication of the key left them locked out of the house.
